subject: Publication of Advertisements on the occasion of Foundation Stone Laying/ Inauguration Functions of NHAI Projects in the Newspapers/ Media - reg.
text: HRTy 77274 TTHf nfarrut 749 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ec @ar7 & TlotTf TTTT4) YTH/ Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) Ji-5 Q 6, 4727-10, ERa , 7} frri-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11014/11/2016-HR-I Dated: 23.05.2017 Policy Circular: (4.20/2017) (Decision taken on Fille NoNHAIIBOT/ 101 946/2010/CN) Subject: Publication of Advertisements %n the occasion of Foundation Stone Laying/ Inauguration Functions of NHAI Projects in the Newspapers/ Media reg: The NHAI has been executing a large number of road and associated projects across the country. The events of foundation stone laying or inauguration of these projects are marked by WIPs the honours in these cases and attending these events NHAI has already issued Circular No. 11016/432/2015-Coord dated 13.10.2016 to all officers of NHAI for strict compliance of the Hon 'ble Supreme Court Order dated 18.3,2016 in respect of publication of Government advertisements in print/ media to mark the occasion: 2 It has been observed that, being closely associated with these projects, the concerned Concessionaires/ Contractors have also been issuing advertisement from their end. Sometimes also use the Logo of MoRTH/ NHAI in their advertisements. While the Concessionaires/ contractors are free to take their own decisions in this behalf, they should not be allowed to use the logo of MoRTH/ NHAI without the approval of the Competent Authority. 3_ Accordingly, it is directed that if any advertisement issued by the Concessionaires/ Contractors in newspapers/ Media also contain the of MoRTH/ NHAI, the concerned private  agencies   should seek the approval of the concerned Regional Officer of NHAI: While granting any such permissions, the concerned Regional Officer  of NHAI shall ensure that the advertisement is strictly as per the guidelines issued by the Ministry f Information & Broadcasting vide their letter dated 20.5.2015 (copy enclosed) in   compliance of the orders of the Hon'ble Supreme Court dated 18.3.2016. 4 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. (A.K. Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Coord) To: All officers and employees of HQ/ ROs/PIUs / CMUs /Site Offices OnT4m WHAL doing they logo
